segments.pli: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism,
and they criticize those deserving of praise.

segments.pli: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti, ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti—
segments.en: They arouse faith in things that are dubious, and they don’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism,
and they praise those deserving of praise.

segments.pli: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti
segments.en: They don’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,

segments.pli: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti—
segments.en: and they do arouse faith in things that are inspiring.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
